name: SENGA-04
description:
SENGA-04 Come explore SENGA-04, a Singapore-inspired city, as a Murker in a Murk apocalypse. You don't know where you came from, or how you came to be. You just exist. -- INSTRUCTIONS --

E - Interact/Eat
Left Mouse Click - Pick up
Right Mouse Click - Drop

-- PLATFORM --

PC
Display: 1920X1080

-- ABOUT THE GAME --

SENGA-04 is a graduation game project centered around a short story that acts as a prequel for a possible game in the future.

The game is set a few years from now, in a world inspired by Singapore. This is an attempt by two artists, Persisca Buk & Amber Chan at developing a game and we hope you enjoy it!

Instagram: @senga04game
